text:
Welcome to MyPlanes
List of functionality:
1.Pilots management
	add pilots
	get pilots statuses
	sort pilots by age
	sort pilots by salary
2.Planes management
	add plane
	get planes statuses
	sort planes by capacity
	sort planes by flight distance
3.Airports management
	add airport
	show number of planes in airports
4.Schedule management
	add flight
	update flight
	sort planes by remaining fly time
